name: Ricochet 3 (TMKingdom, deimos44)
description:
Best in fullscreen mode!

Controls:
Yellow Player - Move with arrow keys & shoot with right shift.
Purple Player - Move with WASD keys & shoot with spacebar.

Instructions:

Survive longer than your opponent by dodging the bullets that both of you created! A bullet becomes deadly after ricocheting off of a wall. Each player has 3 hitpoints. You are also limited in how quickly you can fire.

Created for Bloomfield College Game Development Club's Fall '20 Game Jam by Anthony Bonacci, Kyle Mesce, Aaron Roy, & Irwing Saint-Preux
